user_question: In 2014, which one has more mobile apps globally, Apple App store or Google Play store? How many Apps does it have in million?

knowledge_chain.query: Apple App Store and Google Play store total number of apps 2014 in million
knowledge_chain.raw_result:
The provided context does not contain specific data on the total number of apps in the Apple App Store and Google Play Store for the year 2014. The closest available information refers to 2015, where Google Play Store had over 1.6 million apps and Apple App Store had 1.5 million apps, reflecting a 17% difference. No figures are given for 2014 in any of the document chunks.
